content: of shawl row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet *skip next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet repeat from * across ending with slip_stitch in last single_crochet 53 shells fasten_off repeat row 1 across other long edge of shawl weave in all tails finishing block shawl treating shawl gently so as not to felt it dampen shawl with cool to lukewarm water then roll in towel to absorb excess moisture spread dry towels out on a flat space lay shawl on top of towel and smooth out shaping it to finished measurements cover with more towels and leave to dry copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
